comments.body: Sounds good. Maybe they could also be added to raids?
Could Be A Boss At The End Of Raids :)

I think they should be a boss in mansions and drop Cloaks like in this thread. https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/community/posts/360014277852-Cloaks
This would give you an actual reason to go and find a Woodland Mansion

The illusioner would spawn exclusively in the woodland mansion. Projectiles would be useless against him. he could go translucent and they would fly right through him, he would be unharmed. The illusioner can also create holograms of himself so you will not know which illusioner is the real one. a shield will not help you against the illusioner as his magic attacks will go right through it he like the evoker will summon in vexes The shield will continue to help against the vexes.

The illusioner would spawn exclusively in the woodland mansion. Projectiles would be useless against him. he could go translucent and they would fly right through him, he would be unharmed. The illusioner can also create holograms of himself so you will not know which illusioner is the real one. a shield will not help you against the illusioner as his magic attacks will go right through it he like the evoker will summon in vexes The shield will continue to help against the vexes.
I think this feature will be added but on a new or one Certain mob and if this is added they should make a cobweb animation for when it is thrown and when the blocks are made too
I like the idea, these webs should disappear after a while to not infestate your base in the long run.

YES! Minecraft Dungeons shows Spiders shooting webs that completly freezes the character for a few seconds and I remember playing Minecraft the first time, me expecting the spiders would shoot webs but they just do melee attacks and tbh too many old mobs like zombies are just doing melee. Spiders especially should be a little more challenging that just hopping onto you.
Ya, sure.  Just no new crystal.
Except that the mob is trying to use that tool to kill you.  And it would be too powerful if you could just always get the gear from mobs.
It sure would be easy.  Why do you want it to be easy?

You should be able to knock it out of there hand

And there helmet
Perhaps when you eat the creature it would give the player the glowing effect.
But where would the structures be? Underwater, in caves, in the end or nether?
it would most likely spawn in the warm deep ocean
Not the camouflage creepers again!
But the 2 heads is a bright idea!
Why would they increase the chance of dropping one of their heads when blown up by a Charged Creeper? You can get the head without having to worrying about the percentage.
That would look wierd!
Is it just my console but it seems that creepers explode more now like it’s a new mob.
This is a good suggestion. Don't know why anyone would downvote this.

I don't see the allay fighting at all. It seems like a really peaceful mob and i believe them doing so strays too far from Mojang's idea of it. However, i can see the presence of an allay scaring away vexes, like how zombie pigmen scare piglin and cats for creepers.
or hitting a vex might convert it into an allay?  hmm...
wow good idea

This makes me wonder...

What if clerics spawned allays during raids to kill illagers?

We already have fairly matched village vs. pillagers mobs (the iron golem and the ravager), so what if we got another one?
what if allay pulls out a random enchanted netherite sword???
That is the best idea ever i always wanted amour for my dog in minecraft so thay don't die it always hurt my hart when that happens.

Yes this sounds good plus it reminds me the joke about not having netherite horse armour. This would make it a lot easier if a creeper attacks a you wouldn’t have to feed it so much and maybe there will be enchantments for this specific armour as well, but how would you craft it?
Protect the little doggo, it's always heartbreaking when they die, especially when it's the result of faulty AI
Monkeys would also be good.
And a car that we can drive.
Absolutely NOT. HORRIBLE IDEA.

Hey man, I got the same idea a few mins ago too and I wanted to add it but then I found yours. The only problem with it is that the title doesn't clearly show what the article is about and the words used in the article might be hard to understand for people who aren't native English speakers. AllI suggest is that you edit it a little and make it more understandable and related. Thank you and good day.

a few suggestions:

  •  one crow must fly over a pack of wolves, as in the real world they form a symbiosis.
  •  crows must steal gold drops (ingots, nuggets, swords, etc. everything that shines).
  •  crows should attack your crops (yes, unfortunately there is no corn in minecraft).
  •  also crows should avoid not only the "scarecrow", but also the armor stands, dressed in armor.

 

you can add any item you like to your post

I vote for crows, yes, they're nice. At this point almost animal added to the game is a good addition, as long as it has an use or reason to be. However I am not sure this crow eating zombie mechanic would work or be very realistic, because I believe crows are creatures of the day mostly and zombies we know only come at night, so they wouldn't meet often.
They could breed on their own - like someone else suggested that rabbits should do - when eating wheat crops, and  become hostile when feeding. That would force us to attack them in self defense and then as you say trigger these several other crows to spawn in the vicinity that would not trigger the effect again but would drop black feathers when killed. These feathers could be used to make... make better arrows? And maybe a Potion of the Tracker that highlight enemies around the player the same way as the glowing arrow does.Alternatively we could tame a crow that would sit up high and give us this effect anyway.

BTW guys, carrion is less than 5% of a crows diet.
But yes, they should totally have a symbiosis with wolves! Even though thats more of a raven thing.

Ill put my suggestion for crows here since I think it fits well with your post.

Crows but realistic (so they're as smart as 5yo)  
https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/community/posts/13136876967181-Crows-but-realistic-so-they-re-as-smart-as-5yo-
This sounds really cool. Would probably need a new structure to go with it in a bigger update though.
I had a very similar idea, but without it dripping, just a kind of floating light blob that decays in a few seconds. That way the squid glows where it swims, not just beneath it.

That could work too! 

 

anything that makes it actually glow
I think it would be nice if the ink drop would be at the same rate as chickens. Otherwise, it might lead to performance issues.

@Notesmaker Yea i guess peformance could be problematic

If anything just up the duration on the splatter and the delay on it too to make up for it.

Well the glow squid got added...still kinda dissapointed..

 

the new underwater caves would look so GOOD if the glow squid prediocially lit up stuff on its way!
nice idea while it may not have many functions i think it may really add some life to the game
This sound pretty fun, and I think it should add by dropping a few melon seeds for farming

As Minecraft Earth is ending, the Melon Golem should be added to the standard game, and with it a new block, the carved melon.

Using the scissors on the side of the melon, we would cut a smiling face in it and get one piece of melon.

Carved Melon, apart from being used to create a Melon Golem, would have decorative functions and could be turned into a Melon Lantern. It would shine fainter than the Pumpkin Lantern, because the only light would come from his eyes.

The Melon Golem has a different face than the Pumpkin Golem, for example it may appear to be wearing sunglasses.
Bruh no

Dude, I don't think mojang Is gonna agree on that one, they'd have to ask trevor Henderson himself If they could do that... In addition, you're asking for siren head, not for a more do-able fantasy creature like a nekomata or something like a "lantern-head golem" that's designed after siren head. 

And you never gave ANY specifics, like a balanced HP amount or how/where It spawns. You just saw siren head In an addon and now you want them In Minecraft? This Isn't TABS or fortnite, so too bad...

Again, should have asked mojang for a "lantern-head golem" to defend villages.
Is this a joke? I can't even imagine siren head fitting in Minecraft.

I have no understanding of how this post didn’t get taken down instantly, but perhaps the moderation team didn’t know SirenHead was an unoriginal character. This will never happen, however I could see a SirenHead inspired creature getting implementation, but this? It’s about as realistic as SlenderMan spawning in taiga biomes.
Minecraft is gonna get sued for stealing the SCP and SIREN HEAD writes! Plus, it does not match Minecraft at ALL!!!

Minecraft needs to add mod so we wont be bored like siren head,ice scream,baldi,and more horror addons or mods so we will be able to get mods,and addons,also into our netindo with 2 of the same characters for example phone netindo same account
Hi
I like siren head a boss in minecraft
Can you give me a siren head egg please
Glow Squid should release glowing ink that gives Night Vision
You can get them with world editors, just do some diving
I agree, this would make spawning iron golems for Wither vs. Iron golem(s) fight would be more fun if your attempted iron golem didn't blow up before birth
Snow golems could also use spawn eggs as well.
They exist now! Use them in your worlds.
Axolotles are actually a salamander that hasn't grown up yet . Sometimes they won't grow up if the water they are in doesn't have enough iodine .
it alreddy exists in minecraft dont waste ur votes!

CHEACK UR GAME AGAIN

 

IT ALREDY EXISTS

This would be so nice, but I do think people would exploit this by building an army of like 50 wolves that never die. If Mojang were to add this, they should nerf it somehow.
Have pets be able to be connected to a Respawn Anchor
And have Respawn Anchors work in the Overworld as more expensive beds
Twas hoping this was a thing already. Walked over an ice river like a dunce with two doggos in tow ... looked back to only see one when i turned back around. (They teleport, often under ice)
Please respawn my pet Minto_KING please
Also, polar bears shouldn't hunt foxes.
It always makes me so upset to see two of my faves go ham on each other!! I agree that it's unnecessary
i made a zoo but the wolves killed the foxes PLEZ FIX!
YEAH! I AGREE WITH U Y DO WOLVES EVEN KILL FOXES I LOVE WOLVES AND YES THEY ARE IN THE SAME FAMILY OF THEM AND YES THEY DON’T KILL THEM! U UNDERSTAND ME SO WELL!
Please keep this feature,it helps me keep stupid foxes out. If you do remove this feature,at least let one animal keep killing foxes.
or maybe instead of full health it can give a regeneration effect and dogs could have levels that you can put toward traits like swimming, running, jumping, etc. so that it makes each dog unique.
